name: specter-desktop-cypress-testing
description: node-module to test specter-desktop with cypress

scripts.start: rm -rf .env && virtualenv --python=python3.10 .env --setuptools=57.4.0 --pip=22.0.4 && source .env/bin/activate && pip3 install -r requirements.txt --require-hashes && pip3 install -e . && python3 -m cryptoadvance.specter server --config DevelopmentConfig --debug
